author: markt
msg: Partial revert of r1645465 since StoreConfig is at the Server/JVM level so there is only ever one of them.

author: solomax
msg: [OPENMEETINGS-954] mobile service is updated to send audio-only flag; number of synchronized methods in ScopeApplicationAdapter is reduced

author: markt
msg: When using the (currently undocumented) save command, go direct to the StoreConfig MBean because:
- It removes the dependency on StandardServer.
- It enables the Manager Servlet to detect if the feature is supported or not and show a useful error message.

author: markt
msg: Consistently handle missing StoreConfig MBean for Server and Context case.
